metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1056 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Read error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers tocause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compilelibtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 46dc8fcd.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
